12111.content: How will Tommy become unborn again?
12111.title: Tommy pickles (reserved)

121111.content:
Tommy was sitting in the sand box thinking hard. "Boy I can't remember being in mommy's belly." Little did he know a wishing star was passing by, "Tommy: I wish I could go back" the start then grants this wish as Tommy vanishes his cloths, and diaper falling on the ground.
Now the question is where did he go? What mom got little Tommy in them?
121111.title: A wish

1211111.content: Did Didi make a wish at the same time Tommy did?
1211111.title: Didi duh

12111111.content: Didi was sitting in the kitchen thinking about when she was pregnant. " Oh I wish I could be again, maybe not another baby but to feel it again." At this point she feels funny and her belly starts to balloon out along with her hips and breasts. how will she react?
12111111.title: Yes

info.brief_description: the toons from our old networks are returning to the womb
info.description:
Hello all, here is a new story! our western toons are going back into their mamas, or getting new ones

quick rules
-Allowed
age regression ( even back to the womb or to the balls)
unbirth ( this can be done magical or the old fashioned way)
nudity( no going crazy XD this is a unbirth story at its core)

not allowed
Killing characters ( never fun when your fav is shot down)
vore( this one is to see how clever you all are)
anime( I know I know but we have to let everyone get a turn)

maybe
cock vore( this one I am not sure of yet so it is a maybe try it out but let everyone know what they are getting into)
info.pretty_title: there and back again, A toonish story
